Description:
Stylish, Solid and Packed with Potential
A sublime heritage neighbourhood with Quarry Park and Merri Creek trails at the end of the street finds this brick Victorian terrace offering immediate liveability with options to modernize and possibly extend (STCA). Current floorplan includes three bedrooms (two large), bathroom and separate powder room, wide central lounge/dining area through to the functional kitchen/meals. Add to this gas heating and cooking, full-size laundry, plus a surprisingly spacious back garden with large workshop/storeroom, ROW access and plenty of room to expand. Also close to village cafes and Clifton Hill Station, Spensley Street Primary School, Mayors Park, Darling Gardens and Queens Parade trams. Inspiration charm in an aspirational location! Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 13 Caroline Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
A Fine Balance
This tall, wide and handsome Victorian terrace retains period detail while providing generous contemporary accommodation in a superb location. With 4 bedrooms, spacious country style kitchen, 2 bathrooms, powder room and open plan lounge dining overlooking the entertaining deck and garden beyond with ROW access and heating and cooling throughout. Positioned in the Clifton Hill village close to North Terrace, public transport, cafes and shops, this home is a must see.
Features include:
- Split system heating and cooling throughout
- Large kitchen with walk-in pantry and extensive storage
- 900mm electric oven with gas cooktop
- Dishwasher
- Underfloor heating in lounge/dining
- Telstra/Foxtel/Optus connections
- Large deck, perfect for entertaining
- Barbecue, shed and cabinet storage
- Courtyard with large planters and wall garden
- Rear access from back lane
- Yarra Bend bush and parklands at the end of the street
- Close to the city, schools and transport
Property Video - https://vimeo.com/184642257
Insights: 70 Roseneath Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 10 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Vast & versatile: an authentic conversion
'The Tannery': This spectacularly spacious penthouse residence with sweeping 2-level CBD views illustrates a brilliant fusion of rich industrial detail with light-filled contemporary style. Originally the Trescowthick tannery and after 1911, the Government Harness Factory, this heritage building is set in a quiet street close to Yarra parkland, schools and Clifton Hill Station. The apartment offers a highly versatile floor plan comprising a vast (69 sq.m approx) living and dining room with soaring beam-and-truss ceiling and mellow brick walls, open to a stylish kitchen with imported appliances and quality cabinetry; flexible upper level home office/3rd BR/ living zone flowing to a broad terrace looking out over the Darling Gardens; spacious main bedroom/retreat, second large double bedroom and fitted study; striking 2-way bathroom with bespoke fittings, freestanding bath and shower; powder room and concealed laundry. Including dual stacker parking, lift access and exceptional storage, this unique residence features original timber floors and warehouse detail, split-system air conditioning and premium appointments.
Insights: 6/28 Groom Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Stunningly renovated with parkland outlook
Brilliantly extended in timeless contemporary style and surrounded by exquisitely landscaped gardens (400m2), here is a superbly appointed home professionally redesigned for large-scale family living and entertaining. Bordering Yarra parkland and close to schools and Queens Parade cafes, this 1930s residence with Deco detail offers a carefully zoned floor plan over 2 levels, comprising a bay-windowed main bedroom with striking ensuite (freestanding bath and walk-in shower) and 3 further double bedrooms; spectacular living/dining room with pillared windows overlooking northerly Japanese-inspired courtyard; bespoke kitchen/butler's pantry (AEG appliances, marble and stainless steel finishes); upper-level second living and large attic family room; fitted home office; elegant family bathroom, laundry and powder room. Features of this exceptional property include japanned and polished concrete floors, slab hydronic heating, evaporative cooling and ducted vacuum system.
Insights: 6 The Esplanade, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 10 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Rewarding renovation opportunity
This classic block-fronted Victorian home with side access and easy rear right-of-way entrance is superbly positioned in heritage precinct of quality period residences, close to Yarra parkland, schools, Village cafes and CBD transport. Requiring complete renovation but with brilliant scope to extend (STCA), it offers 2 double bedrooms, spacious living/dining, functional kitchen, bathroom and laundry, with off-street parking, period detail, hydronic heating and split-system air conditioning. An unmissable opportunity in an unbeatable location!

Description:
Timeless contemporary excellence, top address
Architect designed and constructed by Built in Style, this outstanding corner residence with light from 3 sides offers secluded low-maintenance living bordering acres of Yarra parkland and close to CBD transport, Village cafes and schools. A perfect home for a family or busy professionals, it's beautifully zoned floorplan showcases expansive living and dining zones flowing to a landscaped northerly entertaining courtyard, stylish kitchen with Smeg/Miele appliances and pantry, three large double bedrooms (BIRs, ensuite to main) plus study, 2nd family bathroom (bath and shower), fitted laundry and powder room. Including a garage and drying area, polished hardwood floors, split-system a/c, double glazing, LED lights & alarm, this superior contemporary property delivers on all the needs of modern day living in a prime lifestyle location. Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 1 Walker Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Imposing 1880s style, 2 street frontages
This impressive semi-detached Victorian, one of the oldest homes in an exclusive street close to Yarra parkland, schools, Village cafes and station, is a residence of special warmth and character, extended in high-ceilinged style with a deep northerly courtyard garden and double garage accessed from Rose St. Entered from a grand arched hallway, it comprises 2 large double bedrooms with custom BIRs, an expansive living and dining room with polished concrete floors, superbly equipped kitchen (solid timber benchtops and quality appliances), stylish bathroom with spa bath and shower, plus full laundry. With Baltic floors and ornate period detail, this gracious home features split-system a/c, ample storage and premium fittings.
Insights: 36 O'Grady Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
The Wait Is Over!
Here is a rare opportunity to secure one of Clifton Hill's finer homes. This splendid Edwardian family residence is set amidst a delightful established garden with a frontage of 19 metres and an allotment of 602 square metres [approx.] The home will give you seven principal rooms with a versatile floor plan which can be adapted to meet a variety of household requirements.
You will love the library which provides the ultimate home work space and the spacious rear living areas opening to a wide covered deck with garden beyond.
Further accommodation includes three bathrooms, a gourmet kitchen and a large secure lock up garage and easy off street parking for multiple cars. Traditional period features including warm polished Baltic pine floors, original fire places and ornate plaster work have all been retained and blended sympathetically with an extensive renovation planned to meet the needs of the modern family.
Peter Bennett : 0419 502 466
Insights: 11 Clifton Avenue, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 10 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
A spectacular design for family living
This distinguished late Edwardian residence, comprehensively redesigned and extended by Rara Architecture, offers an innovative design for low maintenance living in an exclusive precinct close to Village cafes, transport, schools and parkland. With an accent on light filled high-ceilinged spaces and craftsman-built detail, 'Monolith House' incorporates 3 double bedrooms (main with WOW! factor ensuite and WIR), formal sitting room, stunning living and dining zones flowing to a northerly landscaped garden and off-street parking, bespoke kitchen/butler's pantry with Gaggenau/Miele appliances and European poplar cabinetry, sleek family bathroom, powder room and laundry. Featured in the US-based 'Apartment Therapy' site, this magnificent home features japanned floors, evaporative cooling and hydronic heating, original OFPs with ethanol fires, custom storage and fine appointments.
Insights: 6 Walker Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 10 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Tightly-Held Terrace Opposite Darling Gardens
Magnificent parkland views and coveted Queens Parade proximity offer compelling reasons why this wide Victorian terrace directly opposite Darling Gardens has been so tightly held. Add a large north-facing rear courtyard garden and comfortable interior with exceptional potential and it's as clear as the beautiful outlook that this charming Hawthorn brick home is one to own and enjoy for a long time to come. Only a short stroll to cafes, shops, schools, trams and train station; this inviting terrace with space and scope to stylishly renovate/extend offers arched hallway, two sizable bedrooms, living room with gas log heater, kitchen, adjacent meals area, bathroom, laundry, reverse-cycle heater/cooler, high period ceilings, open fireplace, polished floorboards and rear ROW lane access.
Nicholas Corby : 0418 512 978
Insights: 86 Hodgkinson Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Auction This Saturday at 11.00 View from 10.45
CHARMING COTTAGE WITH APPROVED PLANS
This desirable refurbished home sits proudly on the elevated side of the street with a north facing rear yard that has lane access to assist in completing the approved plans if so desired.
A lot of hard work has been done to the front of the house including two generous bedrooms, a central lounge and then the kitchen and rear bathroom whilst immediately liveable will make way for the extension should you elect to take up the opportunity. Our owners having a change of environment altering their future plans sees this opportunity present to an astute buyer as you won’t need to go through the 9 to 18 month process of planning. Plans and permits will be available if so desired,
Positioned within walking distance of the Clifton Hill express station, schools, Village shops with the foodies Royal Hotel or stroll across Queens Parade through the Darling Gardens for variety on top of which you have great access to the Yarra and Merri environs with bike and walking trails and recreational pursuits whilst being in the heart of the inner city.
Insights: 85 Roseneath Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Vintage Charm with Updated Appeal
One of inner-Melbourne's premier residential pockets sets the scene for this freestanding Victorian home delivering a ready-to-enjoy lifestyle opportunity with its fine period details, extended design and long list of features. Immaculate interior comprises two double bedrooms (both with BIRs) and updated bathroom with spa, central lounge leading through to the well-appointed kitchen (dishwasher and Smeg cooker) and light-filled dining area. Add to this gas heating and split-system a/c, additional wood heater (dining area), alarm, high ornate ceilings and polished timber floors, plus French doors to a north-facing courtyard with extensive brick paving and ROW access. A dream city-edge location walking distance to Yarra trails and Dights Falls, acres of parkland, public transport options, close to popular cafe/shopping precincts and easy freeway access. Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Agent in Conjunction: Bernard Corser 0407 300 678
Insights: 119 Roseneath Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Rustic Elegance Amongst Landscaped Surrounds
Landscaped gardens and a picture book facade enrich this three bedroom plus studio Edwardian home located in ever popular Clifton Hill. Displaying a rustic elegance that boasts leadlight windows, Baltic Pine floors, wainscoting and fretwork, this spacious home features a lounge with built in cabinetry and traditional kitchen/meals with 900mm Ilve upright cooker, timber cabinetry and access onto the paved north facing courtyard. Featuring a fully self-contained studio with kitchenette and bathroom, OFP's, BIR's, air/conditioning, ducted heating, alarm, water tanks, solar panels and ROW access. Walking distance to transport, parks and Queens Parade shopping and cafes, inspection will impress.
Insights: 12 Aitken Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 10 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Superbly Elevated Brick Edwardian
This superbly elevated tuckpointed Edwardian brick Terrace (c1910 ), located on the corner of Kent Street with rear ROW, offers rich lifestyle rewards just metres to the Darling Gardens and Clifton Hill Primary School. This classic semi-detached home will put first-home buyers, downsizers and investors in perfect proximity to the action of Brunswick and Smith Streets, Queens Parade cafes and public transport. Front and rear courtyard gardens flank this delightful light filled home with fretted hallway leading to two generous bedrooms( BIR), large separate living room with Godin gas heater, recently renovated kitchen & bathroom, laundry area, roof storage, open fireplace & high period ceilings.

Description:
Inner City Convenience in a Boutique Block of Six
Superb quality with outstanding inner-city convenience defines the highly-coveted lifestyle appeal of this ground floor apartment. Well set back from Hoddle Street located on the quiet slip lane that accesses South Terrace, this renovated ground floor apartment offers a stylish, single-level layout perfect for contemporary low-maintenance living. The Darling Gardens, Shops, cafes, Train Station and Merri Creek /trails are merely seconds away in such a central Clifton Hill location. 1 of only 6, this excellent apartment includes entrance hallway, 2 sizable bedrooms with built-in robes, separate generous living/dining, excellent tiled kitchen with stainless-steel appliances, modern bathroom, laundry area, panel heating, split system and off-street parking on title.

Description:
Rose Cottage : a picture of elegance
This picturesque terrace with second frontage to George Street, close to Village cafes, station, Spensley Street Primary and Yarra parkland epitomizes the enduring appeal of Clifton Hill. Renovated and extended in light-filled style, this Victorian beauty with high ceilings and classic period ornament offers two double bedrooms with fitted BIRs opening from an impressively wide hallway, adjoining sitting and dining rooms with open fireplaces, gas log fire and French doors to side courtyard, custom kitchen/casual meals (5-burner Smeg range, stone benchtops) and a stylish bathroom/laundry with walk-in rain shower. Including a deck and landscaped north-facing courtyard garden with access to George Street, this delightful home features ornate plasterwork, leadlights and ample storage.
Insights: 40 Spensley Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Refined contemporary style, private park-edge setting
Designed by acclaimed Rothe Lowman Architects, this multi-level townhouse is the ultimate in secure and spacious living, in a secluded enclave moments from Dight's Falls and Yarra parklands and close to Clifton Hill Village and CBD transport. It offers a versatile floor plan comprising spacious living and dining rooms separated by a stylish Miele kitchen with stone benches and pantry, 3 double bedrooms (2 ensuite), 3rd bathroom and Euro laundry. Including an internal-entry garage, courtyard and balconies opening from the living zones, this impressive residence features quality fittings, split-system a/c and generous storage.
Insights: 18 Barries Place, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
SOPHISTICATED CITY EDGE WITH A VILLAGE VIBE
SOLD by Miles Real Estate. Inner city convenience enjoys a distinctly village vibe in this sophisticated tri level town residence positioned just a short walk from gorgeous Clifton Hill Village, Queens Parade shopping, Darling Gardens and Clifton Hill Station. Enhanced by the peace and privacy of its own street entry, smartly presented proportions rise up to top floor living and entertaining spaces where a granite topped kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a beautifully broad alfresco terrace ensure outstanding indoor/ outdoor entertaining flexibility within a dynamic city edge setting. Two spacious double bedrooms with sizeable built in robes/ storage share a stylishly updated family bathroom with both bath and independent shower, landing study nook and cleverly placed internal light atrium. Includes ducted heating/ cooling, secure entry, roller garage parking with internal access. Only minutes to the CBD, Collingwood Leisure Centre, acres of parkland and Merri Creek walking trails plus a myriad of renowned inner city attractions.
Insights: 53 John Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Quality & Space For An Active Family
Refined classical and contemporary styles converge for outstanding family lifestyle with this substantial two-level residence c1903 on a north-facing rear allotment including Abbott Grove frontage. Architect enhanced, this compelling four bedroom, three bathroom home features hydronic under floor heating, air-conditioning, double-glazing, Grey Ironbark and polished concrete floors plus period detail, extensive storage and remote-control double garage. Quietly located on a wide street near Quarries Park, trails, schools, cafes and train station, the superbly zoned layout offers large downstairs parents' retreat (study desk, walk-in-robe, limestone ensuite), sitting room or 4th bedroom, spacious living and dining with Jarrah bifold doors, and granite kitchen with European appliances. Upstairs offers two bedrooms with ranges views, lounge with surround-sound speakers and study nook. Open fireplaces, plumbed rainwater tank, laundry drying cupboard and sun-filled entertainment terrace finish off this first-rate quality and flexible family home.
Antony Woodley : 0421 286 741
Insights: 32 Caroline Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 10 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Impeccably renovated, 2 street frontages
With an accent on clean-edged contemporary design, this delightful Edwardian residence is the quintessence of Clifton Hill style, in a quiet street close to Village cafes, station, Spensley St Primary and parkland. Superbly extended on a deep block with side access and second entry from Clifton Avenue, this light filled home offers a free-flowing floor plan comprising two double bedrooms opening from a wide Baltic-floored hallway, large fitted study, expansive living and dining room, smart galley-kitchen (stone benchtops, premium cabinetry, Blanco range) open to casual meals and private side deck, plus stylish bathroom/laundry. Framed by a pretty front garden, and including a landscaped rear garden and dual off-street parking, this captivating home features OFPs, ample storage, ducted heating and evaporative cooling.
Insights: 17 Myrtle Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Excellence in prized Yarra edge pocket
Impressive space, sensational style, two outdoor domains and a brilliant city edge position. Each one a prized property element in its own right but this fabulous two bedroom apartment delivers all creating an exceptional first home or investment offering at Clifton Hill's fashionable Yarra end. Beautifully quiet on the second floor of a boutique block, a preferred northern aspect ensures brilliant natural light and blue sky aspects illuminate generous living/ dining zones that include a chic semi integrated stone kitchen and broad undercover entertaining terrace. Two double bedrooms, each with BIRs enjoy their own zone with a fully tiled bathroom, one with sole access to a totally private open air terrace boasting dynamic views to the CBD skyline. Further advantages include quality Blanco appliances and dishwasher, intercom security, lift access, storage cage and parking. Walk to Clifton Hill Village, Yarra Bend parklands, city bike trails and Dights Falls, minutes to Fitzroy, Collingwood and Abbotsford bars and nightlife venues, transport options and more.
Insights: 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.
